definition: ileum (segment of small intestine between the jejunum 空腸|空肠[kong1 chang2] and appendix 盲腸|盲肠[mang2 chang2])
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
soul-stirring (of drama, poem or artwork)/heart-rending/deeply moving

sentences.english: The standardized ileal digestibility of amino acids in domestic double-low rapeseed meal was lower.
sentences.chinese: 国产双低菜籽粕的氨基酸标准回肠末端消化率较低。

sentences.english: A peptide release is also part of the "ileal brake" mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 肽的释放也是“回肠制动”机制的一部分。

sentences.english: Objective To study advantages or disadvantages of total cystectomy and W shape orthotopic ileal neobladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨膀胱全切原位W形回肠代膀胱术优缺点。

sentences.english: Follows isolde, but not love a field.
sentences.chinese: 不求荡气回肠，只求爱一场。

sentences.english: Additionaliy, compound enzyme also improved the ileal digestibility of protein significantly.
sentences.chinese: 此外，复合酶还显著提高了蛋白质的回肠表观消化率。

sentences.english: The majority of patients had bezoars located in the lower ileum.
sentences.chinese: 多数的患者肠粪石位于下段回肠。

sentences.english: The writer sings an elegy of concuss the spirit returns to bowel for fool's tragedy destiny.
sentences.chinese: 作者为傻子的悲剧命运唱了一曲荡气回肠的挽歌。

sentences.english: Villus is the epithelial microscopic projections on the internal wall of the ileum.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛是回肠内壁微小的表皮凸出物。

sentences.english: The atonomosis meshs density of the jejunum was larger than the ileums.
sentences.chinese: 空肠器官表面动脉吻合网面密度大于回肠。

sentences.english: No polyp in ileum pouch was seen.
sentences.chinese: 未发现回肠粪袋息肉形成。

sentences.english: The ileocecal valve and terminal ileum are usually dilated rather than stenosed .
sentences.chinese: 回盲瓣和末端回肠常呈扩张面而不狭窄。

sentences.english: I can still remember the strength hearing that word vibrated through my body.
sentences.chinese: 我仍记得听到这个词的时候荡气回肠的感觉。

sentences.english: To feel complete here and now stirring within me.
sentences.chinese: 来这里完全地感受并在让我荡气回肠。

sentences.english: Ileocolonoscopy is considered the "gold standard technique" for investigation of the neointimal ileum.
sentences.chinese: 在末端回肠的检查中，回盲镜被认为是金标准。

sentences.english: After passing through to the large intestine, the ileocecal valve prevents digested food from returning to the small intestine.
sentences.chinese: 在进入大肠后，回肠瓣防止消化的食物返回到小肠。

sentences.english: The ending of the novel bears a soul-stirring charm.
sentences.chinese: 这部小说的结尾具有回肠荡气的魅力。

definition: jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
descending colon (anatomy)/third section of large intestine
mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
ascending colon (anatomy)/first section of large intestine
